title: Ghostly hood

Ghostly hood
Released26 July 2005 (Update)

Advanced data
Item ID6109

The ghostly hood is a piece of members only armour worn in the headwear slot. Players can obtain one after speaking to Dhalak during the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest. The hood has been claimed to serve Dhalak "well over the centuries".

There are no requirements to wear and, when worn with the other pieces, the player appears 'ghostlike' (i.e. transparent). After initially obtaining the piece, the player can talk to any of the ghosts to get more pieces. A lost hood can be purchased from Perdu for 15,000 coins. It can be stored in a magic wardrobe in a player owned house.

[[File:Ghostly hood detail.png|left|130px]]
[[File:Ghostly hood chathead.png|left]]
The '''ghostly hood''' is a piece of [[members only]] [[armour]] worn in the headwear slot. Players can obtain one after speaking to [[Dhalak]] during the [[Curse of the Empty Lord]] [[miniquest]]. The hood has been claimed to serve Dhalak "well over the centuries".

There are no requirements to wear and, when worn with the other pieces, the player appears 'ghostlike' (i.e. transparent). After initially obtaining the piece, the player can talk to any of the ghosts to get more pieces. A lost hood can be purchased from [[Perdu]] for 15,000 coins. It can be stored in a [[magic wardrobe]] in a player owned house.
